plot: Follow fifteen Silicon Valley High School Students during a month-long trip to the Himalayas as they struggle against the mountains and cultural differences to prove that travel can open minds and change perceptions.
title: Namaste Nepal
plot_es: Follow fifteen Silicon Valley High School Students during a month-long trip to the Himalayas as they struggle against the mountains and cultural differences to prove that travel can open minds and change perceptions.
plot_en: Follow fifteen Silicon Valley High School Students during a month-long trip to the Himalayas as they struggle against the mountains and cultural differences to prove that travel can open minds and change perceptions.
